channel.title: Toyota on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Toyota on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Subaru’s new Uncharted EV looks like an undercover Toyota C-HR
item.description: Subaru doesn’t have the deepest bench when it comes to EVs. There’s the Solterra, now in its third model year, and the upcoming Trailseeker, which promises to be the Outback to the Solterra’s Impreza
